en: Have mercy upon me, O God, according to thy lovingkindness: According to the multitude of thy tender mercies blot out my transgressions.
hmr: Aw Pathien, i zainêm ang peiin mi lunginsiet la, I lainatna nasatzie ang peiin ka bawsietnahai hi thaihmang rawh.

en: Wash me thoroughly from mine iniquity, And cleanse me from my sin.
hmr: Ka rîtlonahai hi mi sâwpfaipêk var la, Ka suol hi mi sâwpfaipêk rawh.

en: For I know my transgressions; And my sin is ever before me.
hmr: Ka bawsietnahai hi ka hriet ta sih a, Ka suol hi ka hmaah a um rawp hlak a nih.

en: Against thee, thee only, have I sinned, And done that which is evil in thy sight; That thou mayest be justified when thou speakest, And be clear when thou judgest.
hmr: I chungah, i chung chauah thil ka suksuol a, I mithmuah thil suol ka lo thaw tah a: Thu i hrilin thiem în changtir thei a, Ro i rêlin demkailo i ni theina dingin.

en: Behold, I was brought forth in iniquity; And in sin did my mother conceive me.
hmr: Ngai ta, rîtlonaa inngîrin ka um a, Ka nuin suolin a mi vawn a,

en: Behold, thou desirest truth in the inward parts; And in the hidden part thou wilt make me to know wisdom.
hmr: Ngai ta, sûngril tiengahai hin takna i dit hlak a, Chuongchun, ân lang naw tienga hin varna mîn hriettir i tih.

en: Purify me with hyssop, and I shall be clean: Wash me, and I shall be whiter than snow.
hmr: Husopin mi sukfai la, chuong- chun, fai ka tih; Mi sâwpfai la, chuongchun, vûr nêkin vâr ka tih.

en: Make me to hear joy and gladness, That the bones which thou hast broken may rejoice.
hmr: Hlimna lâwmna chu nain mîn hriettir la, I ru sukthliekhai hi a hlim theina dingin.

en: Hide thy face from my sins, And blot out all mine iniquities.
hmr: Ka suolnahaia inthawk hin i hmai thup la, Ka rîtlona po po hi thaihmang rawh.

en: Create in me a clean heart, O God; And renew a right spirit within me.
hmr: Aw Pathien, keimaa hin lungril inthiengtak siem la, Ka sûnga hin thlarau indiktak siem thar nâwk rawh.

en: Cast me not away from thy presence; And take not thy holy Spirit from me.
hmr: I kuoma inthawk hin mi peihâwn naw la, I Thlarau Inthieng hi mi lapêk naw rawh.

en: Restore unto me the joy of thy salvation; And uphold me with a willing spirit.
hmr: I mi sandam hlimna chu mi pe nâwk la, Tiawina thlarauin mi chel zing la;

en: Then will I teach transgressors thy ways; And sinners shall be converted unto thee.
hmr: Chuongchun, bawsetuhai chu i lampui chanchinhai inchûktir ka ta, Chuongchun, mi suolhai chu nanga tieng ngha nâwk an tih.

en: Deliver me from bloodguiltiness, O God, thou God of my salvation; And my tongue shall sing aloud of thy righteousness.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang ka sandamna Pathien, thisen insuonahaia inthawk chun mi sanhim rawh; Chuongchun, ka lei hin i felna thu hi hlimtakin hlaah sak a tih.

en: O Lord, open thou my lips; And my mouth shall show forth thy praise.
hmr: Aw LALPA, nangin ka hmûr hi hawng la, Chuongchun, ka bau hin inpâkna chu ân hriettir ding annâwm.

en: For thou delightest not in sacrifice; else would I give it: Thou hast no pleasure in burnt-offering.
hmr: Inthawina chungah lâwmna i nei si nawh a; chuong ni naw sien chu pêng ka tih; Pumrawhmanga thilinhlân chungah lungawina hrim i nei nawh.

en: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit: A broken and a contrite heart, O God, thou wilt not despise.
hmr: Pathien dit zâwng inthawina chu thlarau lungriem ithlâk hi a na, Aw Pathien, lungril lungriem ithlâk le insîr ngawi ngawi hi hmusit naw ti nih.

en: Do good in thy good pleasure unto Zion: Build thou the walls of Jerusalem.
hmr: I dit zâwng takin Zion chungah thil ṭha thaw la. Jerusalem kul chu rem rawh.

en: Then wilt thou delight in the sacrifices of righteousness, In burnt-offering and whole burnt-offering: Then will they offer bullocks upon thine altar.
hmr: Chuongchun, felna inthawinahai chungah lâwmna nei tâng i ta, pum- rawhmang thilinhlân le pum- inhlân thil chunga chun: Chuongchun, i mâichâm chunga chun bâwngchalhai inhlân tâng an tih.
